revision.text:
{{Infobox military conflict |conflict=Battle of Radom |image= |caption= |partof=[[Second Northern War]] / [[The Deluge (Polish history)|The Deluge]] |date=February 2, 1656 |place=[[Radom]], [[Poland]] |result=Swedish victory |combatant1={{flagicon|Sweden}} [[Swedish Empire|Sweden]] |combatant2=[[File:Herb Rzeczypospolitej Obojga Narodow.svg|22px]] [[Polish–Lithuanian Commonwealth]] |commander1=[[Rutger von Ascheberg]] |commander2=Sandomierski |strength1=250 men[https://books.google.com/books?id=CT8VAAAAYAAJ&pg=RA1-PA158&dq=Radom+1656+f%C3%B6rluster&hl=sv&sa=X&ei=wq3TUPz6BanR4QTEzoDQDg&ved=0CDUQ6AEwAA#v=onepage&q=Radom%201656%20f%C3%B6rluster&f=false Anders Fryxell, Berättelser ur svenska historien, Volym 11–12] |strength2=1,500 men |casualties1=14 killed,
18 wounded |casualties2=560 killed or captured[https://books.google.com/books?id=kZk7AAAAYAAJ&pg=PA271&dq=Radom+1656&hl=sv&sa=X&ei=7a7TUPz3MYSi4gS-6IGYCg&ved=0CEwQ6AEwBA#v=onepage&q=Radom%201656&f=false Vilhelm Fredrik Palmblad, Peter Wieselgren, Karl Fredrik Werner, Biografiskt lexicon öfver namnkunnige svenske män] }} {{Campaignbox The Deluge}} {{Campaignbox Second Northern War}} The '''Battle of Radom''' on February 2, 1656 between forces of the [[Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth]] commanded by Sandomierski on one side, and on the other [[Sweden|Swedish]] forces commanded by [[Rutger von Ascheberg]]. Swedish forces won the battle. ==References== {{reflist}} {{coord missing|Radom}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Battle of Radom}} [[Category:Conflicts in 1656]] [[Category:1656 in Poland]] [[Category:Battles of the Deluge (history)|Radom]] [[Category:Battles involving Poland|Radom (1656)]] [[Category:Battles involving Sweden|Radom (1656)]] {{Poland-battle-stub}} {{Sweden-battle-stub}}
